accounts.name: CraftableItem
docs: This PDA represents a token registered as an item that can be crafted

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: mint
docs: the mint representing the items crafted

accounts.name: CraftingFacility
docs: This PDA represents a mine item existing at a particular location (e.g. a planet)

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: maxConcurrentProcesses
docs: the max. number of concurrent crafting processes that can be handled by this facility
if 0 then there is no max

fields.name: numConcurrentProcesses
docs: the current number of concurrent crafting processes

fields.name: efficiency
docs: the efficiency rate for this crafting_facility (as basis points)

accounts.name: CraftingProcess
docs: This account represents crafting in progress

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: authority
docs: the owner/authority of this crafting process

fields.name: inputsChecksum
docs: used to check if expected inputs have been supplied

fields.name: outputsChecksum
docs: used to check if expected outputs have been claimed

fields.name: status
docs: The status of this crafting process

fields.name: denyPermissionlessClaiming
docs: Whether or not to deny permission-less claiming.  True when > 0

accounts.name: Domain
docs: This account allows for a crafting "domain" which allows an admin to set up
craftable items, recipes and crafting facilities tied to a domain that the control

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: profile
docs: The [`Profile`] that handles the crafting program permissions

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: duration
docs: The time required to craft this Recipe.

fields.name: minDuration
docs: The minimum time required to craft this Recipe.

fields.name: consumablesCount
docs: The number of consumable inputs in this recipe.

fields.name: nonConsumablesCount
docs: The number of non-consumable inputs in this recipe.

fields.name: outputsCount
docs: The number of outputs from this recipe.

fields.name: totalCount
docs: The number of all inputs and outputs in this recipe.

fields.name: feeAmount
docs: The amount to charge when this recipe is used

fields.name: feeRecipient
docs: The token account that receives the `fee_amount`.  If [`None`] the recipe requires no fees when used.

fields.name: version
docs: The data version of this account.

fields.name: recipeCount
docs: The number of recipes in this category.

types.name: AddRecipeIngredientInput
docs: Struct for data input to add an ingredient

fields.name: amount
docs: the amount of ingredient to deposit

fields.name: ingredientIndex
docs: the index of the recipe ingredient

types.name: BurnConsumableIngredientInput
docs: Struct for data input to burn a consumable ingredient

fields.name: ingredientIndex
docs: the index of the consumable recipe ingredient

types.name: ClaimNonConsumableIngredientInput
docs: Struct for data input to claim a non-consumable ingredient

fields.name: ingredientIndex
docs: the index of the recipe ingredient

types.name: ClaimRecipeOutputInput
docs: Struct for data input to claim an output

fields.name: ingredientIndex
docs: the index of the recipe output

types.name: CreateCraftingProcessInput
docs: Struct for data input to create a `CraftingProcess`

fields.name: recipeCategoryIndex
docs: the index of the recipe's category

fields.name: denyPermissionlessClaiming
docs: Whether or not to deny permission-less claiming.  True when > 0

types.name: KeyIndexInput
docs: Struct for data input for that has `key_index`

fields.name: keyIndex
docs: the index of the key in the crafting permissions profile

types.name: LegitimizeRecipeIngredientInput
docs: Struct for data input to legitimize an ingredient

fields.name: amount
docs: the amount of ingredient to deposit

fields.name: ingredientIndex
docs: the index of the recipe ingredient

types.name: LocationType
docs: Represents different types of locations that a `CraftingFacility` might be found

types.name: OptionalNonSystemPubkey
docs: A pubkey sized option that is none if set to the system program.

types.name: RecipeIngredients
docs: A copy of the [`RecipeInputsOutputs`] struct --> to be used as inputs into the program, avoiding using Borsch Serialization with Zero Copy serialization

fields.name: keyIndex
docs: the index of the key in the crafting permissions profile

types.name: RegisterCraftableItemInput
docs: used as input struct when registering a `CraftableItem`

fields.name: keyIndex
docs: the index of the key in the crafting permissions profile

types.name: RegisterCraftingFacilityInput
docs: Struct for data input to Register a `CraftingFacility`

fields.name: maxConcurrentProcesses
docs: the max. number of concurrent crafting processes that can be handled by this facility
if 0 then there is no max

fields.name: keyIndex
docs: the index of the key in the crafting permissions profile

fields.name: keyIndex
docs: the index of the key in the crafting permissions profile

types.name: RegisterRecipeInput
docs: used as input struct when registering a Recipe

fields.name: keyIndex
docs: the index of the key in the crafting permissions profile

types.name: RemoveCraftingFacilityRecipeCategoryInput
docs: Struct for data input for removing a [`CraftingFacility`] `RecipeCategory`

fields.name: recipeCategoryIndex
docs: the index of the `RecipeCategory` in the [`CraftingFacility`]

fields.name: keyIndex
docs: the index of the key in the crafting permissions profile

types.name: RemoveRecipeIngredientInput
docs: Struct for data input to remove an ingredient

fields.name: amount
docs: the amount of ingredient to withdraw/remove

fields.name: ingredientIndex
docs: the index of the recipe ingredient

types.name: RemoveRecipeIngredients
docs: used as input struct when removing recipe ingredients

fields.name: keyIndex
docs: the index of the key in the crafting permissions profile

fields.name: ingredientIndex
docs: the index of the recipe ingredient

types.name: UpdateCraftingFacilityInput
docs: Struct for data input to Update `CraftingFacility`

fields.name: maxConcurrentProcesses
docs: the max. number of concurrent crafting processes that can be handled by this facility
if 0 then there is no max

fields.name: keyIndex
docs: the index of the key in the crafting permissions profile

types.name: UpdateRecipeInput
docs: Struct for data input to Update `Recipe`

fields.name: keyIndex
docs: the index of the key in the crafting permissions profile

types.name: WrappedRecipeCategory
docs: We are wrapping this around Pubkey so that we can use Anchor's coder to decode it

errors.name: AdminNotMintAuthority
errors.msg: Admin wallet is not the mint authority of the entered token.

errors.name: LocationTypeNotSupported
errors.msg: The provided location type is not supported.

errors.name: OverCraftingFacilityCapacity
errors.msg: The crafting facility capacity has been exceeded.

errors.name: AmountRequired
errors.msg: An amount greater than 0 must be provided.

errors.name: AmountTooMuch
errors.msg: The amount is more than what is required.

errors.name: InputAlreadySupplied
errors.msg: The input has already been supplied.

errors.name: InputNotSupplied
errors.msg: The input has NOT been supplied.

errors.name: OutputAlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: The output has already been claimed.

errors.name: CraftingProcessAlreadyStarted
errors.msg: The crafting process has already started.

errors.name: CraftingProcessNotStarted
errors.msg: The crafting process has not started.

errors.name: CraftingProcessNotCompleted
errors.msg: The crafting process has not completed.

errors.name: IngredientNotAnInput
errors.msg: The ingredient is not an input.

errors.name: IngredientNotAConsumableInput
errors.msg: The ingredient is not a consumable input.

errors.name: IngredientNotANonConsumableInput
errors.msg: The ingredient is not a non-consumable input.

errors.name: IngredientNotAnOutput
errors.msg: The ingredient is not an output.

errors.name: RecipeCountNotZero
errors.msg: The recipe count is not zero.

errors.name: RecipeCategoryCountNotZero
errors.msg: The recipe category count is not zero.

errors.name: ConcurrentProcessCountNotZero
errors.msg: The concurrent process count is not zero.
